value: Write a function named multiplesOfNumbers which takes an argument as limit, and runs a loop from o to that limit and prints the multiples of 3 and 5. Like the below.

title: solution
value:
function multiplesOfNumbers(limit){
var sum=0
for(i=0;i<=limit;i++){
if(i%3 ===0){
sum+=i;
}
if(i%5 ==0){
sum+=i;
}
}
console.log(sum);
}
multiplesOfNumbers(10);
